author: customer - TomR
title: customer - TomR
text:
I’m only setting up a home network but Carrie communicated with me as if I was a large corporation and needed the equipment yesterday… very satisfying. I ordered the equipment on 25 Feb and it was on my doorstep on 29 Feb, if they had one of the items in stock the package would have arrived on 28 Feb, and delivery was free!!
Their product selection is also very good; catering for entry level and high spec., high end, professional level.
Prices are very competitive at the entry level when compared with the big electronic retailers, but the big retailers can’t compete with 4Cabling at the professional equipment level because they simply don’t carry that equipment.
I’ve used 4Cabling before (for cables I just couldn’t find anywhere else) and continue to be satisfied with their range, quality and service.
